channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Car illegal parked., 4th October
item.description:
Dangerous vehicle, jacked up with bricks. Has been SORN by owner but left on the road outside my house for months now. We have very young children who walk past this car every day, it was involved in an accident recently where it fell off the jack and crushed someone. PLEASE REMOVE THIS CAR!

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Arcadian Road, Blendon, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Anstridge Path, 4th October
item.description:
Regularly both bins at either end of Anstridge Path in SE9 are overflowing This pathway is used by a lot of people on their way to bus stops and Avery Hill Park The bins are not regularly emptied
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 300, Halfway Street, New Eltham, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Ospringe Court footpath, 4th October
item.description:
From Alderwood Road Foothpath is uneven and beyond the access gate all tarmac is breaking up. Ospringe Court access Road is used by residents from the Avery Hill Estate
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 46-80, Alderwood Road, Avery Hill, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Loose Paving Slabs, 4th October
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 46-80, Alderwood Road, Avery Hill, London

item.title: Tree root damaging pavement and wall, 4th October
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Ridgeway Drive, Sundridge, London

item.title: Fallen tree over park entrance path, 4th October
item.description:
There is a tree which has fallen halfway (currently precariously balanced on a hedge and fence), over the pathway entrance to chinbrook meadows (the entrance from chinbrook road, in the north east of the park). There is very little stopping this tree from falling further at any time, and people are forced to walk beneath it to enter or leave the park. It is a serious accident waiting to happen.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Chinbrook Road, Chinbrook, London
Report on FixMyStreet
